link.description: Define where to load the accountcreation.msixdef file (full path and name required). The default value is in core, you can specify a full path as well.
If the AccountCreation WebService is customized the FQN will change.

This entry is to load AccountCreation enum type dynamically. If AccountCreation WebService is customized, we probably still want to load the enum type definition from metratech.com/accountcreation and not from the new Web Service FQN. That is why have the entry.
